meanings: (휴식) rest, rest, take a rest, have a rest
stability, stabilization, be stabilized, become stable[steady]

vlive.korean: [생각보다 안정적인 자세] 1, 2, 3, 4, 5... [Better than expected] 1, 2, 3, 4, 5... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
[안정감을 찾은 삼인방] - 나 지금 느낌이 좋아 - 제발! [Three players feel secured] - I guess I'm so lucky. - Please. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.19 뉴이스트의 2020 왁자지껄 운수대통 #1

vlive.korean: 시작! - 우기 너무 안정적이야 - 미연이 옛날에 했었어 이거! Start! - Yuqi is too safe. - Miyeon did this a long time ago! 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
